text: Muhammad Sardar (born 2 March 1944) is a Pakistani wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle 57 kg at the 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Pakistani male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Pakistan Category:Wrestlers at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Lahore Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Wrestlers at the 1970 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Pakistan Category:Medalists at the 1970 Asian Games Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in wrestling Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for Pakistan Category:Wrestlers at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games
title: Muhammad Sardar
